content.query:
USE ny_taxi_discovery;

WITH 

v_payment_info
AS 
    (
    SELECT
        payment_type, payment_type_desc
    FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'payment_type.json',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
            FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
            ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
        )
        WITH (
            jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
        ) AS payment_type
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
        WITH (
            payment_type SMALLINT,
            payment_type_desc VARCHAR(15)
        )
    ),

v_trip_data
AS
    (
        SELECT
            PULocationID,
            payment_type
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/*',
                DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
                FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
            ) AS trip_data
    ),

v_taxi_zone
AS
    (
        SELECT
            location_id,
            borough
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
                DATA_SOURCE = 'ny_taxi_data_raw',
                FORMAT = 'CSV',
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                FIRSTROW = 2
            )
            WITH (
                location_id SMALLINT 1,
                borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
                zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
                service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
            ) AS taxi_zone
    ),
